phrases: So this is the city of Tokyo...
My Talent Is Being a Scarecrow
I was sure the place I am staying was right around here,
but I do not see a building that looks like it...
That girl has chicks on her head.
Tokyo has so many buildings and train tracks, it is like a maze...
There are a lot of dead-end streets in this area.
Did you just move to Tokyo?
Is the place you are heading to near here?
Wh-Which question should I answer first?
Oh, by the way, that restaurant has great Russian cuisine.
Come to think of it, when my daughter came here yesterday,
No, maybe I should introduce myself first...
she got lost and had a pretty rough time.
I would better not say anything that would offend someone from Tokyo...
Once again, I was not able to speak well.
I have always been bad at talking, so I have practiced a lot, but...
Which story should I read today?
Animals sure do love you, Hina-chan.
That keeps the birds out of my fields, so I appreciate it.
I do not even need a scarecrow anymore.
You look just like a scarecrow.
For some reason, I was always being put to work as a scarecrow.
I finally got into the high school of my dreams.
I want to at least try to not freeze up in front of people,
We covered most of it yesterday -PE is basketball, so prepare gym shoes
-We are going to be doing oil painting in art, so wear clothes and an apron that can get dirty Preparations are necessary, so get to the art room early
and be able to talk easily with others.
And while I was worrying about that, I made it here...
This is where I am staying?
I am pretty sure it is the right address, but...
I was told that I could stay here...
The landlady's told me all about you!
The second floor is used for apartments.
That is where I live, too.
I will go get the landlady!
-Thank you for letting me borrow the textbook yesterday!
-The book I borrowed is inside the desk.
-Sorry I could not return it to you in person.
-If you ever need anything let me know.
Some of these books look so old.
This shop has such a nice atmosphere.
In the Forest, Under Cherries in Full Bloom Sakaguchi Ango
Sorry, it looks like the landlady's out right now...
Why will not you look me in the eye?
I have never seen someone eating a book before...
and books are basically my friends.
I adore them so much, I want to eat them up.
A-Anyway, I will show you to your room.
It is like I am in a hotel!
A chest with its own atmosphere,
Wh-Why is there a maid in my room?
Schoolwork comes first, though, so it is only on weekends.
So that is why Mayu-chan is a maid?
I am an employee in the coffee shop.
This is just what I always wear.
I-I heard that someone new was moving in today,
so I was just cleaning up this room!
Mayu-chan wants to be a princess.
Do not treat me like a child!
I am just rehearsing for when I am invited to dances in the future,
so I will not step on the hem of my dress!
Hina-chan, you are starting at Fujimiya High in spring, right?
I am so glad I will have a kouhai there now!
Did you think I was a first-year like you?
I may not look it, but I am a second-year!
People always think I look younger than I am.
I cannot tell her I thought she was in elementary school...
But do not worry, it does not bother me.
By the way, I am a first-year, too.
I am looking forward to it!
The toilet is in the middle of the hallway.
We only have a given amount of time to use the bath, so be careful of that.
Well, I did not finish my breakfast...
Why do not we have lunch?
This is the coffee shop where I work.
There is a coffee shop in the back of the bookstore!
I have to eat a book, too?
Why did you enroll at our high school, Hina-chan?
Well... when I was a scarecrow out in the country...
You mean those dolls that stand in fields?
She really does look like a scarecrow.
Today's practice menu -Stretches <- Do them properly!
-3 kilo marathon <- Try your best not to walk -Vocal exercises -Review the script
-Review strong and weak points and check on props -Check on costume
I wondered what exactly she did.
So she literally freezes up and does nothing...
As you can see, I get nervous easily...
It is unusual to see someone become a scarecrow because of nerves.
But during my school's field trip last year,
I saw a theater club play here.
I was so moved by the actors' bold performances.
I wanted to be like that, too.
So I decided I wanted to be in theater, too.
And that is why you enrolled at our high school?
Um, are you two in theater or anything?
and I bet Kuu-chan could write good stories.
And Mayu-chan could play a princess, maybe...
I would probably eat the script right after writing it...
I could never wear a dress!
But that outfit does not embarrass her?
So you are going to join the theater club, then?
I want to be able to talk a lot in front of people,
and I want to make lots of friends, too.
I heard the theater club was shut down last year, though.
Oh, yeah, come to think of it...
I did not hear about that!
I know it is my fault for not checking before I enrolled there, but...
But, but... there was no Internet out in the country!
And I just bought that cell phone yesterday!
I am going to join the theater club!
I am not interested in any other clubs,
and I am not good at any sports or arts...
The only thing I am good at is...
Scarecrows would not be of any use in Tokyo, would they?
If I am going to live here, I have to work.
I am sorry I did not notice!
Want to go out for a change of pace?
There is a big park nearby.
There is lots of greenery there, too.
I am sure you will like it.
There is a place near there that has great chicken skewers,
and a stand that has great dumplings, too.
No description of the actual park, huh?
Once we are on this road, it is straight ahead.
Oh, the cafe there has amazing cakes!
And once we turn this corner...
Honestly, you are so easily tempted by food.
I smelled delicious taiyaki, so I could not help myself.
Do not blame me if you get lost.
You are like an older sister, Mayu-chan.
H-Honestly, Kuu-chan, you are hopeless without me.
Your big sister will go buy taiyaki for you.
When did she become our big sister?
Mister, I would like three taiyaki, please.
And since you are such a cutie, I will give you a discount.
She was our big sister a minute ago,
and now she is an elementary schooler.
It is crispy on the outside,
with lots of soft red bean paste on the inside.
Actually, I think this is the first time I have bought food and eaten it on the spot.
Here is a fresh-picked tomato and cucumber.
I will throw in a daikon, too.
I got most of my food for free...
And the cherry trees are in bloom
I met a kitty cat in town today
It kept meowing and kept calling to me, so I followed it, and ended up at a gathering spot for kitties!
There were a lot of cute kitties, and they all came up to me and were friendly.
Not many people come over this way, so you can relax.
The dumplings from the stand by the entrance were so good, too.
Get your mind off food already!
Can we go look at the ducks?
There are ducks in the pond!
I will not eat the duck.
YOU-Uh... Kuu-chan, do you like ducks?
Especially the way they slide through the water...
It looks so cool, like a stealth fighter!
Is not it a nice place?
All the greenery reminds me of the forests out in the country.
I was feeling a bit down,
I guess you are not homesick anymore.
Who killed my friend with this blade?!
There are lot of small theater troupes around here,
The killer could not have been someone here.
so the aspiring actors and troupe members come here to practice often.
The door to this place was closed the whole time!
And the windows lock from the outside.
They look like they are running straight toward their dream.
Nobody could have gotten in or out.
I really do want to go into theater...
That girl practicing over there is Aki-chan!
I wondered why you were not at home,
but I did not expect to see you here!
If you were going out, you should have said so.
Hina-chan, this is a classmate of mine,
and the landlady of our building.
I am Chiaki, the landlady of Hitotose Manor.
She is tall and has a nice figure...
I-I will be in your care starting today.
Looks like an arranged marriage meeting.
You know, Aki-chan used to be a child actress.
She still loves theater to this day.
She used to be in the theater club at Fujimiya High School, too.
but on the stage, she is a different person!
Her role as a former biker gang member
and young proprietress at a traditional inn who is now an idol singer
What kind of play was that?
I entered Fujimiya High School because I wanted to be in its theater club.
But when I heard the club was shut down, I was so shocked.
More accurately, it is on hiatus.
The club's advisor is on a theater trip.
It is on break in the meantime.
It is on hiatus because of that?
What are the other members doing?
they are all doing the things they want to do.
But if you want to perform theater that much,
why do not you start a theater troupe?
Small theater troupes do not need many members.
So you would be the leader, Hina-chan?
More accurately, she would be the principal.
What are you guys talking about?
Wait, are we being dragged into something?
I was sad when I heard the theater club had been shut down...
Could I really do something like that?
Still, all the people at Hitotose Manor are so nice.
I hope everything will work out.
You are been in here for a long time.
She looks like a boiled octopus!
What do you mean, I am here?!
I am not sure how to answer that.
Can I really start a theater troupe?
I cannot be a scarecrow forever.
I have to remember how I felt on the day I decided that is how I wanted to be!
